casebody.data:
DEWITT AND DAVISON v. VLIET. Mr. Sherrard

applied for a rule to shew cause why a new trial be not granted; because the verdict was contrary to the Judge’s charge and to the evidence, and the case involved new important questions; and this statement being corroborated by the suggestions of the Judge who tried the case, the Court.

Chanted the rule.

Cited in Moore v. Cent. R. R. Co., 4 Zab. 277.
